No translation needed, but just in case: "Look, it's Jon Snow. He came to save us." "But... what the...

This just made my day 😂😂

No translation needed, but just in case: “Look, it’s Jon Snow. He came to save us.” “But… what the fuck are you doing?” “No way!” “His assgaryens are so beautiful!”

summary: Ned Stark: lives through his father being burned alive and his brother’s strangulation, was condemned to die by order of the...
body:
Ned Stark: lives through his father being burned alive and his brother’s strangulation, was condemned to die by order of the king (along with his best friend), married the betrothed of his dead older brother, led a rebellion to overthrow a king, witnessed two dead children being presented as a “gift” to his best friend, observed his best friend’s glee over the murders, held his sister as she died, raised her son as his own bastard son because his best friend would have murdered him too, fake bastard is also the grandson of the guy who burned his dad alive and had his brother strangled.

(some) Readers: bUt hOw cOuLd nEd sTaRk hAvE aLlOwEd hIs kIdS tO gRoW uP sHeLtErEd!?!?

summary:
A Game of Thrones: Illustrated Edition - Arya Stark & Jon Snow by Magali Villeneuve  
 Jon messed up her hair. “I will miss you,...
caption:
A Game of Thrones: Illustrated Edition - Arya Stark & Jon Snow by Magali Villeneuve

Jon messed up her hair. “I will miss you, little sister.”

Suddenly she looked like she was going to cry. “I wish you were coming with us.”

“Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle. Who knows?” He was feeling better now. He was not going to let himself be sad. “I better go. I’ll spend my first year on the Wall emptying chamber pots if I keep Uncle Ben waiting any longer.”

Arya ran to him for a last hug. “Put down the sword first,” Jon warned her, laughing. She set it aside almost shyly and showered him with kisses.

When he turned back at the door, she was holding it again, trying it for balance. “I almost forgot,” he told her. “All the best swords have names.”

“Like Ice,” she said. She looked at the blade in her hand. “Does this have a name? Oh, tell me.”

“Can’t you guess?” Jon teased. “Your very favorite thing.”

Arya seemed puzzled at first. Then it came to her. She was that quick. They said it together:

“Needle!”

The memory of her laughter warmed him on the long ride north. — Jon II

summary: Crossed Wires - toaquiprashippar - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
title: Crossed Wires - toaquiprashippar - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms, Game of Thrones (TV)
Rating: Explicit
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Daenerys Targaryen
Characters: Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, Daario Naharis, Ygritte (ASoIaF)
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Strangers in the night?, Smut, Fluff and Smut, Serendipity - Freeform, Falling In Love, Who knew crossed wires could help like this?, Happy Ending
Summary:

Dany calls her friend, but it’s another person’s voice she hears.
All that a phone call, crossed wires and ghosts of past relationships can do to help you find love.

A little drabble to bring some positivity to our favorite couple, our otp. I can’t help but dedicate this to the friends that never let me stop writing or let me brood too much about my arm LOL 

Beta’d by the always awesome @ktwrites <3

I hope you guys enjoy it! <3

tags: i'm not against either of them
I'm sure as hell not for them either
it was fun shipping until you guys turned it into a bloodbath
summary: Me: *scrolling through Tumblr* Me: *sees Jonsa and Jonerys shippers fighting each other* Me: *sees Jonsa and Jonerys shippers...
body:
Me: *scrolling through Tumblr*

Me: *sees Jonsa and Jonerys shippers fighting each other*

Me: *sees Jonsa and Jonerys shippers claiming moral superiority over the other*

Me: …You do realize that both ships are incest, right? Like, there’s no moral superiority with that…
